grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 脱【ダツ】de- (indicating reversal, removal, etc.), post-
逸脱【イツダツ】deviation, departure, omission
解脱【ゲダツ】being liberated from earthly desires and the woes of man, (reaching) nirvana, moksha, mukti
kun reading compounds: 脱ぐ【ぬぐ】to take off (clothes, shoes, etc.), to undress
脱げる【ぬげる】to come off, to slip down, to slip off
